info.name: Microbox Core API
info.description: The full API spec for Microbox Core, and other Nanobox-v1-compatible dashboard and coordination servers.

item.name: app
item.description: Endpoints that interact directly with the application.

request.description: List all accessible apps.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Get information about a specific app.

item.name: component
item.description: Endpoints that interact with application components.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: List components in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Get information about a specific component in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: List components in a given service of a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Get information about a specific component in a given service of a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: List deploys in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Create a new deploy.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Get information about a specific deploy in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: List environment variables in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Add or set an environment variable.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Get information about a specific environment variable in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Delete an environment variable.
Create an event

item.name: remote
item.description: Endpoints for accessing servers and components.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

variable.description: the name of the server or component to tunnel into

request.description: Create a tunnel, and get the connection parameters.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

variable.description: the name of the server or component to console into

request.description: Create a console session, and get the connection parameters.

item.name: service
item.description: Endpoints for interacting with individual services within components.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: List services in a given app.

query.description: the application's team name, if `{app}` is a name

request.description: Get information about a specific service in a given app.

item.name: user
item.description: Endpoints that interact with user data.

query.description: email address of the user
password of the user

request.description: Look up the auth token of the user

query.description: password of the user

request.description: Duplicate of `GET /user_auth_token`, with the `slug` in the path; abandoned with a switch from usernames to emails for login credentials
Get the current user
The Nanobox API no longer exposes this endpoint, but Microbox will for purposes of detecting the difference in future releases when that starts to matter.

response.status: A JSON object with the name and version of the API.
response.name: Response_200

variable.description: the adapter registration token generated by the dashboard for this adapter

request.description: Register a hosting provider adapter

query.description: the unlink_code returned when this adapter was registered

variable.description: the adapter registration token used to register this adapter

request.description: Unregister a hosting provider adapter
